entries.en-US: > This file extends [common/testing.md](../common/testing.md) with TypeScript/JavaScript specific content.
entries.zh-Hans: > 本文档基于 [common/testing.md](../common/testing.md) 扩展，补充了 TypeScript/JavaScript 特定的内容。

entries.en-US: Use **Playwright** as the E2E testing framework for critical user flows.
entries.zh-Hans: 使用 **Playwright** 作为关键用户流程的 E2E 测试框架。
